name: NeuroRegenesis
description: A prototype for a racing game I created for a game jam with a mental health theme.  In NeuroRegenesis, your brain must make its way through a visually stunning tunnel as slowly as possible to quiet your mind and relieve yourself of anxieties about running out of time.  Pickups in the tunnel include a Buddhist statue representing meditation and a Treble symbol representing music as a stress reducer.   Both of these pickups will slow your brain down to a more manageable pace.  Additionally, be wary of clocks that will speed up your brain and force you to finish the level more quickly than intended.
